name: <str::pattern::SearchStep as fmt::Debug>::fmt

fmt::Formatter::<'a>::debug_tuple_field2.doc:
Shrinks `derive(Debug)` code, for faster compilation and smaller
 binaries. `debug_tuple_fields_finish` is more general, but this is faster
 for 2 fields.

str::pattern::SearchStep: Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 47, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])
Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(1, Ty { id: 47, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])
Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 47, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])
Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(1, Ty { id: 47, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])
